title: Autism without tears
creator_credit: Joan M. Curtis and Mansfield Playschool
brief_description: Produced to help people understand the autistic child. The Mansfield Playschool is conducted during the Christmas period as a holiday and instructional camp for autistic children and their families. Simple demonstrations of work being done and the reason for the use of special techniques are included. Narrated by Dr Joan M. Curtis.
